PHP Manual

XMLWriter::setIndent

(PHP 5 >= 5.1.2, PECL xmlwriter >= 0.1.0)

XMLWriter::setIndent — Toggle indentation on/off

Description

Object oriented style:

XMLWriter
bool setIndent ( bool $indent )

Procedural style:

bool xmlwriter_set_indent ( resource $xmlwriter , bool $indent )

Toggles indentation on or off.

Parameters

xmlwriter

Only for procedural calls. The XMLWriter resource that is being modified. This resource comes from a call to xmlwriter_open_uri() or xmlwriter_open_memory().

indent

Whether indentation is enabled. Defaults to FALSE.

Return Values

Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

See Also

  • XMLWriter::setIndentString
